column4: Hey guys, I'm in need of a bit of help if anyone could spare a few mins - I'm stuck on a Ubuntu LiveCD after installing it screwed my mbr
if anyone could tell me how to use root permissions on a LiveCD, or fixmbr my vista installation I'd be massively grateful
I'm a massive Linux n00b, despite being good with Windows, so sudo / mounting installations is a bit foreign to me
I've given Ubuntu its own hard drive
I think you're right kishan, but I can't change them from the LiveCD
why couldnt you edit that from a liveCD ?
from nano .. Ctrl + X then Y
